Name: VR2: Vacate 2 Rooms (Virtual Reality Escape)
About the game: VR2: Vacate 2 Rooms is an Escape the Room game. It's the next experience after VR: Vacate the Room Can you find your way out of the different rooms? You need to find a lot of hidden items. Uncover secrets. Use strange mechanisms to proceed through the different rooms to the exit. Please notice: Multiple Rooms but no(!) cheap teleporting There are at least two rooms! There might be a secret ending! A VR room size of at least 2.1m to 1.6m is recommended, more would be even better. Please make sure that you can reach at least a height of 1.75 meters. Hotkeys: F5 - Restart Game 1 - Low Quality 2 - Mid Quality 3 - High Quality 4 - Very High Quality 0 - Auto Quality (not recommended)
